Package xyz.bhom.verification.requirements

Class Requirement

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.bhom.verification.requirements.Requirement
  • @Generated("jsonschema2pojo")
public class Requirement
extends Object
    Requirement

    Requirement: Object representing a single, condition-based requirement to run against each object in a set filtered based on Specification.ExtractionAlso contains the config required to represent the verification results in a human friendly form.
